page.title: Real Estate Google Ads & Meta Ads report Template 2026
page.metaDescription: Track leads, property inquiries, and local visibility. The perfect Google Ads & Meta Ads report template for Real Estate agencies and developers.
page.subtitle: Real Estate marketing is local and fast-paced. Show your clients exactly how many qualified inquiries you generated for each property listing.
page.benefitsTitle: Why Top Estate Agencies Choose Flipika

executive.title: The Broker Overview
executive.description: High-level view for agency principals. Track spend and lead volume across all agents and territories.

ecommerce.title: Commercial Real Estate
ecommerce.description: Deep dive into B2B leads for office and retail space. Higher CPAs, longer cycles.

agency.title: Multi-Location Template
agency.description: Perfect for agencies managing franchise real estate networks. Compare branch performance.

step1.title: Connect Google Ads
step1.description: Link your account. We pull location data and call extension metrics automatically.

step2.title: Filter by Location
step2.description: Create separate sections for each neighborhood or development project.

step3.title: Add Property Images
step3.description: Upload listing photos to the report to make it visual and engaging.

step4.title: Auto-Send to Agents
step4.description: Schedule weekly emails so agents have their lead numbers before the Monday meeting.

automation.title: Listing Reports
automation.description: Automatically group stats by Campaign/Listing. Show sellers exactly where their marketing budget went.

realtime.title: Live Lead Tracker
realtime.description: Don't make agents wait. Give them a live dashboard of incoming calls and form fills.

design.title: Luxury Aesthetic
design.description: Real estate is about image. Your reports should look as premium as the properties you sell.

whitelabel.title: Agency Branding
whitelabel.description: Your logo, your colors. Establish your agency as the market leader.

multidevice.title: Mobile Friendly
multidevice.description: Agents live on their phones. Your reports work perfectly on mobile devices.

support.title: Location Support
support.description: We understand local targeting and can help you visualize geo-performance.

tip1.title: Show the Map
tip1.description: Real estate is location. Use the geo-map widget to show where buyers are searching from.

tip2.title: Calls > Clicks
tip2.description: Agents want phone calls. Highlight 'Call Extensions' metrics at the top.

tip3.title: Cost Per Lead
tip3.description: Always context CPL with property value. $50 lead for a $1M home is cheap.

tip4.title: Competition Info
tip4.description: Use Auction Insights to show which other agencies are bidding on your keywords.

tip5.title: Mobile Stats
tip5.description: Most home searches happen on mobile. Show mobile traffic share to justify mobile ad spend.

tip6.title: Visual Ads
tip6.description: Include previews of the top performing image ads. Sellers love seeing their home online.

tip7.title: Local Terms
tip7.description: Highlight search terms with neighborhood names to prove local relevance.
